entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:21 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:21 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
